The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 December is 1,664,511 (2,957.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 December, there were 116,283 new confirmed cases (206.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 December, there were 86,388 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (29,895 extra cases).
